attributes.action: immediately drop the investigation into Damian Green and suspend those who authorized this raid.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
It is unacceptable in this country for police or any other authority to prevent opposition MP's of any party from challenging the government.
This is the whole basis of democracy we do not want a police state.
The people who authorised this raid should be immediately suspended  and pending investigation dismissed from their posts.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
